channel.title: Home on Khanh Nghiem
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Khanh Nghiem

item.title: Why you should practice writing
item.description: Lately, I have been obsessed with Janelle Monáe. This obsession began with her latest album “Dirty Computer”. I admire how articulate and thoughtful she is with everything that she does. So I did what any true fan would do: I tried to watch as many interviews with Janelle Monáe as possible.

item.title: About
item.description: Illustration collab with Hoang Tho Khanh Nghiem /k⋅ahn ng⋅eem/ (b. 1997) grew up in Hanoi, Vietnam. He moved to the US in 2015 to attend Connecticut College. He graduated in 2019 with a BA in Computer Science and minors in and Sociology and Mathematics.
